channel.title: travis on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in travis on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Travis CI Review
item.description: Is Travis CI a good CI tool? Travis CI is a very popular and widely used tool. I was personally using Travis for quite a while and had a good experience. There are few things you should consider before starting with Travis. It’s very easy to start with Travis. I cannot imagine a faster integration with a CI tool. All you have to do in order to start is to add your github repo to travis.
